column4: im trying to install gnome shell, and it says fix broken crap first.. What do i do?
pastebin details
erm, ubuntu tweak is not supported
you've used ubuntu tweak.  That's likely why you're system is messed up now
you can doubt it, but it's a third party app that does sometimes not so smart things.  Thus making it a pain to support people who use it
ubuntu tweak is not in the repositories
anyway /I/ won't support it
if someone else wants to help you with it, that's fine.  But I'd recommend not using it
start by not talking in all-caps.  Did you follow the instructions ubottu gave you earlier regarding restricted formats?
what *exactly* is not working?
if you want me to help you, you need to be specific and address me when you're answering my questions
ok, well im trying to get divx working and it wont
give me an example that is not working
give me an EXAMPLE
well you can give me a specific example that I can try here or you can choose not to and just not have it working
is this some sort of piracy site?
piracy is not supported here.  Is there some non-piracy site that is not working for you?
then we can't help you
my guess is it's just some virus on that site anyway
I'm also pretty sure we've had this discussion before.  Don't ask about that site here please
please stay on the topic of ubuntu support here
